author: martin
msg: Allow apache acting as a proxy server to relay the real reason of a
failure to a client rather than the "internal server error" it does
currently. The general exposure mechanism can be triggered by any
module by setting the "verbose-error-to" note to "*"; this allows
more than just proxy errors to be exposed.
Reviewed by: Roy Fielding, Dirk-Willem van Gulik, Martin Kraemer

author: martin
msg: Add [PATCH] use ap_execve() for suexec if defined(NEED_HASHBANG_EMUL)

author: pcs
msg: Make test.exe INSTALL.DLL tester a bit more end-user friendly. The
menu option to run the INSTALL.DLL function is now Configure|Configure.
This prompts for the installed Apache directory, and defaults to

msg: Use ap_snprintf when writing printf formats to fixed length buffers,
